title: Sagamore Hill National Historic Site: Education
body: A History Lesson Your Class Will Enjoy Learners of various ages, from third graders to high school and college students, enjoy field trips to Sagamore Hill. Aside from being a unique and very memorable place, it is the only presidential site on Long Island. It is a source of local importance and pride for students in surrounding communities, and it is a site that welcomes visitors from across the country and around the world. Learn about what we have to offer, such as: Parks as Classrooms, Planning a Field Trip, Curriculum Materials, Guest Speakers, Traveling Trunks, Suggested Reading and Other Resources.
